dictionary.item: Paint large surfaces with the new paint roller.
Use the mousewheel or press A and S to rotate the roller.
save this in your facebook album
send as collaboration to a friend
* after dowloading, ask a shop clerk to assist you.
save in Dudes Factory Facebook album
You will loose your current graffiti.
Visit us on facebook for more surfaces, collaborating with your friends, getting a Best Of Award, and much more!
Do you want to try it out now?
You can only try out once.
Make sure your internet connection is working and try again later.
Something went wrong. Remember, You can only test this item once.
Upload this Graffiti to the official S.W.A.T. Gallery:
Submit this Graffiti for the T-Shirt Competition:
Send a Collaboration request to one of your friends:

Sorry, we could not save your collaboration.

Make sure your internet connection is working and try again later.

Sorry, we could not notify your friend.

Please try again later.

Collaboration Request sent!

You will be notified when you friend posts the result and anytime someone collaborates with this piece.
You have to message your friend in order to collaborate. If you cancel, your collaboration gets cancelled too. Only your graffiti will be saved.

Sorry, we could not save your graffiti.

Make sure your internet connection is working and try again later.
You cannot save more than 1 graffiti!
You have another Graffiti saved for later. Do you wish to override it with this one?
$friendname$, $username$ wants you to collaborate on this Graffiti!
Go to Graffiti S.W.A.T. to finish this piece!
just submitted $graffTitle$ to the S.W.A.T. Gallery!
just submitted $graffTitle$ to the T-Shirt Competition!
Check out $userFirstName$'s piece in our Graffiti Gallery!
Check out the new piece in our Graffiti Gallery!
Vote for $userFirstName$'s piece in our Graffiti Gallery!
Vote for the new piece in our Graffiti Gallery!
Create and share realistic graffiti with Graffiti S.W.A.T.
You're now the proud owner of a brand new, shiny Blackbook! Press continue to add your very first Graffiti into it!
You're can now post into our official S.W.A.T. Gallery! Press continue to make your Graffiti accessible for our Gallery!
Seems like you already own a Blackbook. Please confirm your upload.
Your graffiti has been submitted to the Competition. Proceed to post it in the Gallery for voting.
All Graffiti in this album were created using the Graffiti S.W.A.T. application. Come spray your own graffiti at http://apps.facebook.com/graffitiswat/

Your Graffiti has been saved...

...and will soon appear in your Blackbook.
Your Graffiti has been saved and copied into the S.W.A.T. Gallery.

Your Graffiti has been saved.

You can continue it next time you visit Graffiti S.W.A.T.

Upload Successful, Wallpost Failed.

Make sure your internet connection is working properly.

Upload failed.

Make sure your internet connection is working and try again later.

Sorry!

Your graffiti was uploaded unto the Graffiti S.W.A.T. Page, but we failed to tag you in it. Please contact us for more information.

Upload to S.W.A.T. Gallery failed.

Please try again later.
Creating download file... this can take up to 1 minute.
Please wait... a download window will open shortly.
You need the necessary rights to save. Click "CONTINUE" to grant them.

Amazing!! You've uploaded an incredible amount of 1000 Graffitis! You have now reached the last page of your Graffiti S.W.A.T. Blackbook!

Click "CONTINUE" to get a new blackbook and upload your first graffiti unto it.
Sorry, we could not connect to Facebook.
Make sure your internet connection is working and try again later. If the problem persists, press download to save your file contact us at facebook.com/GraffitiSWAT.

You need to grant us access to your wall and photos in order to save to facebook and to your friends in order to collaborate.

Try again and click "Allow" on the Facebook Permissions window.
